indicator.summary: Stochastic RSI is a Stochastic interpretation of the Relative Strength Index. See documentation for more information.
indicator.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
indicator.param: Number of periods for the RSI.
Number of periods for the Stochastic.
Number of periods for the Stochastic RSI SMA signal line.
Number of periods for Stochastic Smoothing. Use 1 for Fast or 3 for Slow.
indicator.returns: Time series of Stochastic RSI values.
